author: USA TODAY
title: Oscars: The 9 worst dressed
text:
Oscars: The 9 worst dressed Erin Jensen, USA TODAY 9:06   
Even before the envelopes were opened at Sunday's Academy Awards , there were clear winners on the red carpet. While most celebs looked stunning, not every star found a place on our best dressed list. The following looks were just a touch off. 1. Dakota Johnson 
Johnson's long-sleeve, ecru Gucci with a high neckline is a tad matronly for the starlet. 
It's a lot of fabric, in a color that doesn't necessarily flatter her complexion. (Photo: Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK) 2. Blanca Blanco 
Perhaps you don't know her name, but you will remember this dress. The actress' number with pattern, poufy sleeves, red belt and major slit has a lot going on. 
Though not nominated for an Oscar, she could be the winner for highest slit. (Photo: Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK) 3. Felicity Jones 
While Jones' glam is on point, the color of the Rogue One: A Star Wars Story star's Dior gown washes her out. 
Would've loved the A-line frock in lilac. (Photo: Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK) 4. Leslie Mann 
Mann's Zac Posen dress really brightens up the red carpet, but the billowing silhouette overwhelms the How to Be Single actress. 
A sleek column shape would've made this look timeless. (Photo: Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK) 5. Olivia Culpo 
The good news is Culpo's Marchesa dress brought attention to the global water crisis, the bad news is the black belt was distracting. Culpo told E!'s Ryan Seacrest that the dress is made with pieces from a Stella Artois chalice in partnership with Water.org, which when purchased , provides five years of clean water. 
The bad news is she ended up here. (Photo: Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK) 6. Riz Ahmed 
We applaud men who give the Heisman to a basic black tux, but the bright color of this look by Ermenegildo Zegna verges on costume-y. 
Sadly, giving us a touch of the blues. (Photo: Frazer Harrison, Getty Images) 7. Ava DuVernay 
It's so hard to wear slate, and the director nearly pulls it off. However, a warmer shade would've done wonders for this ensemble by Ashi Studio. 
One shade of grey. (Photo: Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK) 8. Priyanka Chopra 
The fit and pattern of this number by Ralph & Russo are perfection, but this neckline is a tad severe. Rounded edges or a sweetheart neckline would've been better. 
She still shines. (Photo: Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK) 9. Ryan Gosling 
Hey girls (and guys), placing Sebastian on this list hurts us as much as it hurts you. But the ruffled Gucci shirt with contrasting seams is tough to swallow. 
Don't be mad at us, Ryan. (Photo: Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK) Facebook
